programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: We preview UFC 320 at T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada, which will be headlined by the rematch between light heavyweight champion Magomed Ankalaev and Alex Pereira.

programme.title: UFC Greatest Fights
programme.desc: In 2011, light heavyweight legends Dan Henderson and Mauricio `Shogun' Rua, finally faced off in UFC. Relive the action and hear both men recount their memories of this epic clash.

programme.title: UFC Greatest Fights
programme.desc: A look back at the featherweight bout between Cub Swanson and Choi Doo-ho at UFC 206 in Toronto, Canada.

programme.title: UFC Greatest Fights
programme.desc: We turn back the clock to UFC 166 from October 2013 as Gilbert Melendez and Diego Sanchez went head-to-head at the Toyota Center in Texas.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: We take a look back at Manchester United's historic UEFA Champions League final win over Bayern Munich in 1999 and Liverpool's epic victory over AC Milan in 2005.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: We look back at Real Madrid's historic 2017 Champions League final success over Juventus. Plus, we remember Inter Milan's victory against Bayern Munich in 2010.

programme.title: SailGP: Racing on the Edge
programme.desc: An unprecedented look at SailGP and the sport's best athletes.

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: Hosted by Rob Hatch, The Gruppetto brings you everything you need to stay up to speed with the world of cycling, from in-depth race reviews to the latest news from the peloton.

programme.title: Le Tour de Langkawi
programme.desc: Men's Cycling Pro Series action from the second stage of the 2025 Tour of Langkawi in Malaysia, which takes the riders on a 167km route from Padang Besar to Kepala Batas.

programme.title: Tom Aspinall's Fight Lab
programme.desc: Tom Aspinall previews a huge card at UFC 320, which will feature Merab Dvalishvili v Cory Sandhagen and Magomed Ankalaev v Alex Pereira.

programme.title: Live: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Action from MLB Postseason.

programme.title: World Series Film
programme.desc: Meet the 1997 Marlins, the first club to win the World Series as the Wild Card. Through six games Florida battled a stacked Indians club to a standstill. In Game 7, the Tribe was on the verge of winning the World Series.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: What does the future hold for cricket in the battle against global warming? Reshmin Chowdhury meets people at all levels to discuss how cricket can be a positive force for change.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: A look back at the first T20 between Australia and South Africa at TIO Stadium in Darwin, featuring a starring performances by Tim David and Josh Hazlewood.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: We revisit the second T20 between Australia and South Africa at Marrara Stadium in Darwin. Dewald Brevis would put in a record-breaking performance for the visitors.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: We rewind to the third T20 between Australia and South Africa at Cazalys Stadium, which featured big-hitting innings from Glenn Maxwell, Dewald Brevis and Mitchell Marsh.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from the opening game of the 2025/26 Gallagher PREM season, as Sale Sharks and Gloucester Rugby go head-to-head at CorpAcq Stadium.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Bath Rugby begin their Gallagher PREM title defence as they travel to face Harlequins at Twickenham Stoop. Bath won a 47-28 thriller when these sides last went head-to-head.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: A new-look Newcastle Red Bulls kick-off their 2025/26 Gallagher PREM campaign with the visit of Saracens to Kingston Park. Sarries won 75-28 when these sides met in May.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from the opening weekend of the 2025/26 Gallagher PREM season as Northampton Saints face Exeter Chiefs at cinch Stadium.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from the opening weekend of the 2025/26 Gallagher PREM campaign as Bristol Bears meet last season's runners-up Leicester Tigers at Ashton Gate.

programme.title: Premier League Review
programme.desc: A look back at the best from matchday six the Premier League, including Brentford v Man United, Newcastle v Arsenal and Chelsea v Brighton.

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: Hosted by Rob Hatch, The Gruppetto brings you everything you need to stay up to speed with the world of cycling, from in-depth race reviews to the latest news from the peloton.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto3 Grand Prix of Japan at Mobility Resort Motegi. Can standings leader Jose Antonio Rueda secure his ninth win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto2 Grand Prix of Japan at Mobility Resort Motegi. Manuel Gonzalez topped the podium in this race last year.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP action from the 2025 Grand Prix of Japan Sprint Race at Mobility Resort Motegi. Can Marc Marquez take another huge step towards sealing the MotoGP title?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Japan at Mobility Resort Motegi. Will Marc Marquez seal the MotoGP title in style?

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the 2025 Grand Prix of Japan at Mobility Resort Motegi.

programme.title: World Superbike Rewind
programme.desc: We rewind to relive the most exhilarating moments from the Aragon Round of the 2025 Superbike World Championship.

programme.title: Live: Le Tour de Langkawi
programme.desc: Men's Cycling Pro Series action from stage four of the Tour of Langkawi.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Genoa host Lazio at Luigi Ferraris Stadium.

programme.desc: The pick of the goals from matchday one of the UEFA Europa League, including Aston Villa v Bologna, Rangers v Genk, Red Star v Celtic, and Real Betis v Nottm Forest.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: After suffering defeat against Bayern Munich last time out, Chelsea look to get off the mark as they welcome former boss Jose Mourinho and his Benfica side to Stamford Bridge.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur look to make it two UCL wins from two as they face Bodo/Glimt at Aspmyra Stadion. Spurs beat the Norwegian champions en route to the UEL final last season.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Diego Simeone's Atletico Madrid look for a response to their dramatic defeat at Anfield as they welcome German side Eintracht Frankfurt to Riyadh Air Metropolitano.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Roberto De Zerbi's Marseille face-off against John Heitinga's Ajax at Orange Velodrome. Both sides tasted defeat in their league phases openers.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Pafos welcome Vincent Kompany's Bayern Munich to Alphamega Stadium. Can the Cypriot champions cause a massive upset against the six-time UEFA Champions League winners?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Cristian Chivu's Inter go head-to-head with Czech champions Slavia Prague at San Siro. Can the Italian giants make it two wins out of two in the league phase?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Highlights Show
programme.desc: A round-up of all the goals from Tuesday's UEFA Champions League matchday two fixtures, including Galatasaray v Liverpool, Chelsea v Benfica, and Bodo/Glimt v Spurs.
